review: I don’t usually write reviews but I’ll take time out my day to write this one. I don’t find it fair that someone can report you for ANY reason whether it be that you decline a date,  it doesn’t work out between you and the person, or you ignore their advances.  Once they report your page, there is no looking into the matter and your page automatically gets suspended. I’ve had this happen to me TWICE. A creep asked me for inappropriate pictures, I declined, he reported me and I lost my profile. I was talking to a few potential candidates to date and that all went down the drain. My number or email no longer works to create a new profile and I’ve done absolutely nothing wrong. I’ve spent a lot of money on this app, and now I regret it. Thanks Badoo.
title: Not fair

review: They decided to delete my profile just because some guys were reporting on me for being mean since I didn’t want to trade pics with them or talk to them. Well, I have my rights and no one can force me to talk to anyone that I’m not interested in and this report didn’t bring out any justice as this app be keeping all of the disrespectful users' profile. title: This app is just lame

developerResponse: {'id': 19628174, 'body': "Hi again, thanks for the response. Have you been in touch with our Support Team on social media? We'd really like to help you delete your account and address any other concerns mentioned that you may want to discuss - you can find us @BadooHelp on Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram.", 'modified': '2020-12-08T20:47:05Z'}
review:
Simply Put Absolutely The Worst Free Dating App - Horrible, Avoid. Getting COVID-19 would be better than getting this worthless piece of garbage.

The developer asked me (via email) to explain why I gave this app the horrid review it deserves, here goes:
1. I cannot delete my profile. The instructions say that if I can’t it is because I did not verify my email. NOT TRUE! I did verify my email and my email is linked to my account. That is how the developer contacted me, via email - garbage!
2. Most of the profiles are not local women - garbage.
3. The app CONSTANTLY tries to hit you up to pay for the service. Just make a pay for use app and don’t bill it as free - garbage.
4. You can contact some local users but not others and there is no explanation why - garbage.
5. In my opinion anyone that has used “high quality” free dating apps (POF, Bumble, Tinder, Facebook Dating) and then uses this piece of garbage will see the differences immediately. I believe the favorable reviews are 100% fake.
6. All I want from Badoo is to be able to delete my profile and get as far away from this festering, stinky pile of garbage as I can.
Are you happy Badoo?
title: Simply Put Absolutely The Worst Free Dating App - Horrible

developerResponse: {'id': 8676495, 'body': 'Hey there! Thanks for reaching out to us. We appreciate that our users may not have access to Badoo all the time. You may come across a few inactive profiles whilst on Badoo as we like to give our users the freedom to return to their account whenever they choose and resume where they left off.', 'modified': '2019-05-15T06:19:31Z'}
review: Overall it’s decent. Not a lot of people are active it seems like so it’s almost really hard to find people. Also people don’t really respond very often. It’s hard to find people that are active without swiping through thousands of people. Also people put their location to near me and the only people I match with end up being outside the country. The one thing they really need to do is delete or freeze accounts so that when they see they are not active don’t put the “frozen” accounts available for people to see that are actively looking. In my experience the only people I have matched with end up being half way around the globe trying to practice their English....
title: Okay app but needs work

review: The app itself is okay and it runs fairly well. I like the features, but I don’t at all appreciate the lack of African languages to choose from. They only have Swahili and Afrikaans. We don’t all speak Swahili and Afrikaans is a language that was derived from Dutch and brought about by white people to South Africa. The very term Afrikaaners is literally the term for white South “Africans”. Not the original people of that land. There’s absolutely no options for those of use from Any other part of Africa that speak many languages include Twi, Yoruba, Zulu, Xhosa, Igbo, etc and those are some MAIN languages spoken. But yet you have 80 different languages from European areas. Get it together Badoo. The world is far more than the European perspective.
title: Okay

developerResponse: {'id': 29212966, 'body': 'We are sorry to hear that! \n Please send us a message on badoo.com/feedback, and we’ll sort this out for you. Remember to contact us using your registered email address to speed things up!', 'modified': '2022-04-17T10:12:26Z'}
review:
Ironically badoo deleted an option to delete one’s profile, this is really unprofessional and annoying as there are still references to ability to delete a profile on their help page, but no actual such option. I for one will not be forced to use this app and will not be recommending it to anyone.

Update: Oh, cool, they’ve actually responded to my review … by providing a quote from an old how-to (that I have mentioned in my review) on deleting a profile. Flash news, bozos, the cog button is on the left now not the right, and there is no delete account option at the bottom of the page there or anywhere else for that matter. Thanks for being extra helpful, I’m downgrading my review to one star.
title: Let people delete their profile

developerResponse: {'id': 27668387, 'body': 'Your opinion really matters to us, so thank you for taking the time to leave this constructive review. We will forward your comments to the relevant team for further review, so they can be taken into consideration in future updates. Thank you for helping us build a better product!', 'modified': '2022-01-26T07:46:32Z'}
review:
This app shares your location with strangers and lets them know if you “bump” into them. You can turn it off but it’s the default. This feature seems incredibly unsafe, especially for women, as it can encourage stalking behaviors. 

The other feature that made me very uncomfortable was that it does not protect your privacy. Anyone from around the country can send you multiple messages and sends a read receipt, so you can’t really just ignore messages if someone is persistent, even if you decide not to match with them. In that case your only recourse is to block and report them, which feels somewhat extreme in many cases.

This app caused me a lot of anxiety to use. Women especially, please stay away from this app for your safety and privacy.
title: Unsafe for women

review: It’s like Tinder took the advice and criticism of their users and actually took action and created badoo. I have tinder and I still use it but Badoo is a great breath of fresh air. From the user interface to the match making this app is smarter. My favorite thing about the app is that they verify users by actually having patrons take photos of themselves so you can separate real users from bots and scammers. Only gripe is that you cannot change search distances or narrow locations. If you use this app be sure that you have a car! Much love from NYC
title: The app if Tinder took advice

developerResponse: {'id': 25796673, 'body': "We are so sorry that that happened to you! We work hard to keep a database of high quality real members, and our moderation team works 24/7 to spot any malicious profiles. We also have a photo verification system in place to prevent fake members from using the app. However, if you're suspicious about a profile, please report them and we'll check them immediately. Drop us a message @BadooHelp on social media or send us an email via badoo.com/feedback 💜, we will investigate this!", 'modified': '2021-10-20T16:04:56Z'}
review: I met a guy on here who ended up stealing money I gave him to fix my car and then ghosted me. I report his profile every time I see him. Today, he messaged me saying he missed me. I told him off and reported him for OFFLINE BEHAVIOR. When I went back to my profile, I find out it’s been deleted because of my “rude or harassing messages”. 😳 Are you kidding me? This app does NOTHING to protect women!! I report fake profiles and scammers and dudes who say disgusting, rude, horrible things, but their profiles are still there! I’ve given so much feedback to this app to try to help them out, but this is the last straw! This app is NOT SAFE FOR WOMEN and supports scammers. Do not use this app if you’re a woman! I never will again, and will shout it from the rafters that women should not use this app!
title: Women BEWARE!!

developerResponse: {'id': 22391905, 'body': "Sorry to hear about your photos! We can help you with this - our team's available on social media @BadooHelp any time you need us. Have you tried turning off the GPS on your phone for more accurate results? Although we do allow users to travel and make connections on the app, so they can build relationships before a move or holiday 💜", 'modified': '2021-04-22T08:36:06Z'}
review:
I used to use this service before smartphones, when it was just a website for finding international friends.

I honestly cannot recommend it as an app.

The UX (interface, usability, features, etc) are fine, but forcing users to upload a specific type of photo before they can do anything of interest is simply not compatible with the culture where I live (American living outside the US). Even then, the photo upload either has some AI that judges it or human moderators that will reject it based on their own subjective opinion; without any notification to the user. Plus, for those of us just looking for new friends amid quarantine, why is something so superficial as a photo prioritized over more salient criteria for finding interesting people? Finally, I've never seen such a ragtag assortment of clearly non local people tagged as local; not even sure how to explain this.

Deleted after it/someone kept rejecting my photo and I couldn't really do anything else in the app. Some places value privacy over arbitrary requirements.
title: Meh and a half

review: I’ve been on this app before and someone would report me because I’m not interested or I won’t send nudes it’s always something dumb, then my account gets deleted and it won’t tell me why or by who and when I reach out to them I don’t hear anything back, they don’t even look into the situation they just delete it because someone reports it over something so petty. Now when I make a new profile it doesn’t work like, I get no matches, no visits or anything, I’ve even have friends look for me just to see if I would pop up or something and I just don’t pop up, like my page isn’t even real. title: Expectations too high

developerResponse: {'id': 28795527, 'body': 'Thank you so much for liking our photo verification. This helps us stop people from making fake accounts. You can always turn the GPS off on your phone for better results and then manually enter your location in the app by clicking onto your profile> settings> basic info> locations. With the free version your swipes will be refreshed every 24 hours. Hope this helps!', 'modified': '2022-03-26T13:13:13Z'}
review:
So far, I am liking this app. I like the photo verification, it is reassuring that fake profiles are being minimized. One thing that does get to me about this app though is the amount of people that like me that live hours away. Is there a way to screen this? I am not at all interested in long distance, and it’s overwhelming the amount of profiles I have to click through only to find out the location does not work for me. Please fix this!

Edit: I was liking this app until my free trial ran out and I was needing to pay to swipe right. What a bummer! I’m not paying for this app, I refuse. I think they should limit how many likes a day, but to force you to pay to even use it is just ridiculous. Especially in times like this!
title: Meh

developerResponse: {'id': 10357705, 'body': "Sorry to hear this! We work hard to keep a database of high quality real users, and our moderation team works 24/7 to spot any malicious profiles. We also have a photo verification system in place to prevent fake users from using the app. However, if you're suspicious about a profile, please report them and we'll check them immediately.", 'modified': '2019-08-26T13:25:35Z'}
review: The time I spent on this app was very brief. I heard good things about it from other people, but either things have gone downhill, or more bots and fake accounts have plagued the site since it started out. Never have I seen someone who had reached out to me wanting to chat, and then a day later, changed all of their photos, name, and location—completing altering their identity for no apparent reason! Yet the job description and About Me section were the same word-for-word. The quality of “real” people on the app was barely discernible from the fake accounts. The photos and selection of matches I was seeing were low quality, and purposefully so. I may dislike apps like Tinder and OkCupid, but at least I felt a little safer on those sites and not so manipulated.
title: Disturbing and Fake Accounts

title: REALLY BADOO!!!

review: I fell in love with Badoo’s format the second I opened the app.  I’ve only had it for two days now thus I’m yet to lose my free trial of Premium, so I’ll come back after it expires in case my rating changes- but as an informal premium user Badoo is fantastic!  I especially appreciate the automated conversation-starters you can click if you’re nervous and the “your move” that appears once you’ve received a message from a match.  All around very user-friendly and safe.
title: Free 3-day trial makes all the difference

developerResponse: {'id': 3125781, 'body': "Badoo is free to use but, for those of you who want to stand out from the crowd and interact with our top rated users, we also offer a large range of premium services such as credits and Badoo Premium. Alternatively, keep an eye out for our offer-wall promotions that'll reward you for taking part in surveys and app downloads!", 'modified': '2018-04-18T12:33:21Z'}
review: Apparently Badoo is Latin for "show me the money".  Demanding a fair price for good value isn't a bad thing. Except of course... there's no value here. Not in matches, not in services or anything that actually pushes the ball forward in meeting that special someone.  It may be "free to use", but nothing that actually benefits you. It's just the same old tired slew of waves, pokes, likes, gifts, and bleh all lovingly designed to demand payment. I really don't see why the dev even bothered.  There isn't much to do here if you don't bring your wallet... so you never get a feel for how any of these items they want to sell you would help you. Better to stick to established apps: there's more matches, more people, and more to do without someone reaching into your pocket every other swipe.
title: Poor value - Money grab

review:
I have been on badoo for about a month now, and out of all these I have actually got on and got accustomed to... badoo has got an A+ on all the things I was expecting to have in a dating app, I love the face verification thing so you know if your talking to a real person, I love how they gave you free badoo premium for like a week? it just made go buy badoo premium once it ended LOL... anyways I love this app very much, the reason I said this is bc I also met my now boyfriend on here and I wouldn’t change it for anything
Love u badoo!
title: Honest Review

review: So far I have to say this app is one of the best apps I’ve used in terms of population and features. Right off the back you have a trial of the fully unlocked version where you can see all of your likes to make matches easily. Even the free version though is pretty good. I like that even if the user doesn’t complete a written profile usually there is some good information of their living status and preferences. The only hiccup is that the responses can be overwhelming at first and a lot to digest. Good job developers.
title: So far one of the best

Sooo I have been using this app for a few months and met some interesting people. Some good ones and some crazy ones. The issues I have with this website is you can’t filter by ethnicity; if only wanted to view certain races I can’t do that. Also, I can’t change my email therefore when I submit questions I never get an answer. When I filter by age I still profiles that are outside the range... why is that???
Then the website itself.... I met someone who was Blender and somehow saw my profile... I’m not on Blender so how does that happen???
Overall it’s an ok website, I only get on here when I’m bored because the profiles and there descriptions are funny to read. 
Badoo, please do better!
title: Real or Fake

review: The best app for socializing and making new friends across the world. User friendly, quick in notification, has crisp sound in calls and videos, and gives proper location with real people. Badoo team are always ready to respond to all queries and they remove flagged contacts to keep the media cleared from fake accounts. Lately it became too slow to open pictures and see visitors.
title: The best app for socializing and making new friends across the world

developerResponse: {'id': 28416685, 'body': "We are sorry to hear about that! If you believe your profile was blocked by mistake, please message us and we'll investigate this further as a priority: badoo.com/feedback or @BadooHelp on social media.", 'modified': '2022-03-07T07:36:33Z'}
review:
First off, let’s just put this out there, my Badoo account is less than 2 months old and I attempt to open the app after a long day at work to check my messages and see that I had been logged out. Strange, but okay. 
I log in to see a message saying that my account has been blocked due to rude or threatening behavior (which I know that I’ve never done) I filed a message online to Badoo support and didn’t hear anything back within a reasonable amount of time so I send another message, a bit more detailed, explaining my issue. Sill nothing. Third times a charm, right? Wrong. Nothing. 

 I am convinced that there isn’t anyone on the other end of the computer and this app is almost entirely run by bots. 
 
 Now on to my second complaint, this app only allows me to swipe a few times a day if I’m lucky. Then, once I’m out of swipes, it could be up to 2 days before they refill. Why is this? The whole app seems buggy and full of annoying adds.

 It looks like Tinder still wears the crown unfortunately.
title: Account suspended for no realistic reason.

review: Yes is a good app , but I think there’s is something missing you know when u see someone and you like the person but some how the profile now doesn’t even exist or you can’t seem to find the persons name anymore well , I think there should be an Search bar , to look for someone’s name if you like them or something like that . But I love the app how it is an how it looks simple and easy like that . And yes I’ve met people very kind and some very odd I just block them if they odd but most of the people are super nice .
title: So honestly

So thank you Badoo for allowing me to meet the man or my dreams and future father of my baby girl! 5 stars for sure!
title: I found my soulmate on this app!

review: This app does not allow you to filter location so it matches you with anyone in other states and countries. And there’s no good way to find the people you actually want to talk to either.  So far I haven’t even been matched with anyone in the same state as me...do not download!  It’s a total waste of time.
title: Not Worth Your Time

I wouldn’t mind if there was just a monthly subscription fee that lets you use the app freely but that’s not the case

That wastes both time and effort getting to know potential partners, doomed to remain as friends alone. Please change it back. Thanks.

We do not condone any type of discrimination on Badoo- we work very hard to ensure that everyone is welcome and will never exclude certain members based on individual preferences. Let us know if you need any help at @BadooHelp on social media or via badoo.com/feedback.', 'modified': '2022-10-14T06:39:39Z'}
review: They have people working for them that if they don’t like you they take your profile down even if you don’t do anything and even if you verify and the system approves it later they take your profile down and give you bogus excuses . Also other people report trans and they side with them even if you don’t do anything just because you reject them or defend yourself from rude messages . This app is very transphobic and racist. They want your phone number and have you verify pic and they still want to start trouble with someone if they don’t like you being on the app . Don’t trust these people at all there’s better out there
title: Transphobic app

review:
I’m serious about dating, having a relationship. I definitely put in a lot of effort and I love to talk, so an app where you are likely to chat is up my alley. Never had a conversation with someone that lasted for more than an hour, most never messaged back or sent a message. I even saved up 100 credits for free to try out the ‘spotlight’, and gained nothing. Before deleting my account, they offered three days of Badoo ‘premium’, and nothing changed.

Maybe it’s because I’m doing something wrong, but I genuinely feel as if I’ve wasted tons of time putting in effort to be glossed over consistently by bots or randoms. It’s a very depressing environment.
title: Used It For Months - No Good Results

developerResponse: {'id': 21288555, 'body': "Sorry to hear you didn't hear back from us- our team may be dealing with some delays at the moment. Please feel free to reach out to our social media team @badoohelp on Twitter, Instagram or Facebook!", 'modified': '2021-02-25T11:00:28Z'}
review:
Account was banned for no reason and when I emailed them they said that it was moderated and don’t know the specific reason. So pretty much if anyone wants to flag someone they can whether you have violated the community rules or not. I will just stick to the main dating sites anyways. 

Reply to company: I have messaged the company and gave time for a response or remedy. But when I sent my email in there is a 48 hour time limit or the case will expire as per company rules. I have sent an email in and never got a response back. Bad customer service and not coming back. Don’t respond to my review because you didn’t respond to my email.
title: App has terrible moderators

developerResponse: {'id': 20012099, 'body': 'Hey there, Thak you for your feedback. We will be sharing this with the most relevant teams. Please try deleting the app and reinstalling it again. If you have further trouble you can always reach out to us on @BadooHelp', 'modified': '2020-12-27T10:25:41Z'}
review: Please revert the app back to how it worked before this last update. Whatever was done to it has completely ruined the functionality. When I ask the app to show me unread messages, nothing changes. It’s hard to find the most recent connections and messages and it’s almost barely usable. I always used the app before the update and had absolutely no issues, besides the occasional problem of not being notified when I have a new math or message. Please fix or change back ASAP. Your customers will thank you.
title: Been Great Up Until Recent Update

review:
Tinder is a joke compared to this app. Not only is there a search function, you can message some people, it’s easy to get matches and you can swipe a lot of people a day, and overall solid app without having to spend $50 just to meet 1 person who might not even like you

My only problem is the app keeps asking to rate even though I already did. Almost want to dock off a star for that
title: This and OkCupid are the least pay 2 win

developerResponse: {'id': 17622818, 'body': "We're so sorry to hear you had this experience and we've passed on your comments to our app developers who will take them into consideration in future updates. Thank you for trying out Badoo and for leaving an honest review!", 'modified': '2020-09-01T08:32:45Z'}
review: I honestly just wanna try this out for fun. Firstly, they keep asking and rejecting my photos. Secondly, they failed my verification 5+ times, and won’t let you do anything unless you verified (while having my photos on the active acct). Most importantly, So difficult to delete. I literally had to google how to delete the acct. The delete button is incredibly tiny, hard to find and basically blend into the grey backgrounds. When you delete, it takes more steps compare to other dating apps. Honestly, why do you put your users through all of this? Dating apps are come and go. Let your users be. I won’t come back and I won’t recommend.
title: Keeps asking for photos and difficult to delete!

review: I was kind of skeptical about dating apps. This was my first time ever trying one and I just so happened to be lucky. I met someone that I’ve been with for almost two years now and it’s still going strong! Now there are some creeps/guys looking for a one night stand sort of thing, but what dating app doesn't have creeps? I’m pretty sure they all do similar things. You can always just block them which also made my experience a lot more comfortable.
title: Totally Worth It!

developerResponse: {'id': 5399913, 'body': 'Sorry to hear this. To assist you with any billing issues on your account, we kindly request that you contact us on badoo.com/feedback.\n\n This will allow us to bring up your details and get back to you as quickly as possible.', 'modified': '2018-10-08T09:20:19Z'}
review: Was in the app dropped my phone. I kinda fumbled it a little...I accidentally touched the fingerprint scanner when I picked the phone up and it was to late there was nothing I could do... so I contacted them immediately and they refused to refund my money says that I verified the purchase when I used my fingerprint but I literally touched it for a second and I didn’t even know what was on the screen... that’s called stealing... how do you force somebody to make a purchase if they didn’t want it... it was a complete accident period... I’ve used this app and have a lot of respect for this company for a long time but this is ridiculous... I want my money back. Don’t use an accident against me just to be some savages...
title: Accidental Purchase

developerResponse: {'id': 26794025, 'body': 'Tu opinión nos importa mucho, así que gracias por tomar el tiempo en dejar este comentario constructivo. Enviaremos tu opinión al equipo correspondiente para su revisión, para que pueda ser tomado en consideración para futuras actualizaciones. ¡Gracias por ayudarnos a desarrollar un mejor producto!', 'modified': '2021-12-13T07:54:08Z'}
review: It’s a pretty good app for connecting with people close too you, but it is definitely a lot more effective with a premium membership!…. Only thing I’d add to the app is a way to pay for a membership by trading in popular gift cards, and receiving a certain amount towards your account (of course the trade in would not be equal. For example a 20$ Walmart gift card could turn into like 15-17$ towards a premium account if used)
title: Badoo Review

developerResponse: {'id': 31271393, 'body': "Thanks for letting us know about the technical issue you're experiencing. We'd love to report this to our team and fix it! To help us with this, please message us on badoo.com/feedback  with a few more details - screenshots will help too.", 'modified': '2022-08-04T06:53:32Z'}
review:
I’m unable to delete my account in app due to a technical error. I’m also unable to contact support in app due to a second technical error.

I reached out to support via email and they sent me a repeated auto reply, telling me to delete my account in app (although I can’t due to an error) and that I should contact them again if I can’t delete me account (and now the in-app contact form isn’t working either). 

The geo location feature that enables you to “bump into” nearby people is scary. I do not feel safe with people knowing my geo location.
title: Filled with Technical bugs and privacy concerns

developerResponse: {'id': 19669698, 'body': 'Hey there, we are sorry to hear this. Our moderators are working 24/7 to remove any fake profile from our app. If you would like us to look into your block again you can always reach us on @BadooHelp 💜 Hope this helps!', 'modified': '2020-12-10T10:38:45Z'}
review: Don’t download this app , I downloaded the app trying to make new friends and clearly I put my IG and Snapchat usernames so people can visit my profile and they can see that I’m not fake and I am a person and I do have a life , bc I came across so many fake profiles and scammers in general and I guess somebody wanted to hook up and meet up and I didn’t respond bc I don’t hook up with strangers without even knowing them well and they blocked my account bc I was “promotin my social media” when clearly there’s many accounts that have it on their profile too. Don’t waste your time use a different app , this app is trash plus I emailed them and all I got is a bot answering back the same message over and over again .
title: Scam

Would make sense if you could meet more people. It’s far less. Same over and over again. You have to pay, to talk to anyone. Which means you pay to talk to fake profiles. But they send you notifications like it means something. Except they won’t go away unless you pay. I’m not cheap. I’m just not an idiot. I’ll pay for real people, and real opportunity. If it’s all fake and games. They make a lot of money off of advertisements. They should just let us get something worth while while we are at it. Crap app. Trash.

Deny men that are shirtless if you think tank tops are too revealing for women

I’m going to delete this app and there are many other daring apps dont ask you to pay to see if your messages have been read or not. Shame on you Badoo team. Everyone should give them ONE STAR THAT IS WHAT THEY DESERVES.👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻

review:
Have used the app for a while, very user friendly. Oddly, some things that used to be included in Premium membership I’m now being “charged” for. Like having to spend credits to see if my message has been read. You’d think benefits of membership would be added, not taken away.

Update:  And apparently they don’t have reading comprehension skills since they think that now having to use credits for something I used to get without credits is a good thing.
title: Overall Good but membership benefits are disappearing

developerResponse: {'id': 27069369, 'body': 'Your opinion really matters to us, so thank you for taking the time to leave this constructive review. We will forward your comments to the relevant team for further review, so they can be taken into consideration in future updates. Thank you for helping us build a better product!', 'modified': '2021-12-27T08:31:56Z'}
review: It is my first day on the app, so I know it is still to early to tell. But I went straight to premium plus just to give it a shot. I will say like well over 50% of the girls I have seen that are "near me" do not live in the Country I live in. Whether its a verified accout or not, which I do appreciate... I still would like if my preferences are set to more local, it not include a bunch of people out of my country. However the other mechanics seem pretty simple.. only other complaint Id have is I have little purple dots acting as a notification in places that dont have anything to notify me about.
title: First Day

developerResponse: {'id': 23546696, 'body': "Thank you for your review.\nThat's indeed a great piece of advice!", 'modified': '2021-06-23T14:16:42Z'}
review:
I wasn’t really sure what I was looking for when I made my account. However, I was happy to find out that all kinds of people use this app. 

I am a guy who was looking for girls and I found real people on this app interested in going on real dates.

I didn’t really get into hook ups. Though, I found plenty of girl looking for FWBs too. My personal advice is just be yourself cause there’s a lot of cool people to meet.
title: I recommended this app

review: I waited a while to leave my review to say don’t give up! I downloaded this originally just to have conversation with someone. I ended up finding the love of my life. Our two year anniversary is in a few weeks. We are currently long distance but plan our taking our next steps and getting a place soon. If it wasn’t for this app I would have never found him. This is my soulmate and I couldn’t ask for more!
title: I found my soulmate

Thank you for listening
title: I like it but ...

review: I love the live streaming is real good just a little improvement about the location on the people streaming need to be from the same country or city as the user and the other thing is stop with that selective app for the premium persons everybody is confused and disappointed cause no one can messages other user because there are not premium user everyone is the same and same policy for all users.

We also count on the support of the community - if something doesn't feel right, please report it and our team will review 🙇", 'modified': '2022-01-10T07:43:21Z'}
review: Honestly, wow. I was on this app for less than 24 hours and let me tell you. I received hateful, harassing messages (because anyone can message you- it doesn’t require liking, which is always problematic. Expect many creeps and trolls). It’s a real confidence boost if you like being harassed but if you’re looking for anything other than enemies then this app is not the one for you!
title: If you like being harassed, join Badoo!

developerResponse: {'id': 32331470, 'body': "Steve, we're sorry to hear about your negative experience, but Badoo is free to use. review:
First time on any dating app.  So if your a first time person wanting to try a dating app this app is not good, with respects that even with their premium offer your limited to meet or communicate people you maybe interested in.  Not cool. Oh you can buy their coin thing on top of what you paid.  Oh guess what… your offered more exposure if you pay just a little bit more.  Just not cool.  
  Here’s the deal.  I would pay a reasonable amount to be able to connect with other like minded people. I would like unrestricted capabilities to to meet people on line. Your app does not offer that.  So hard pass. I will not subscribe ever again.
title: Not cool

review: I went through this time in my life where I need to find someone and tried ALL of these dating apps after one night stands crying thinking I would never find love and endless swiping rights and lefts and unmatching I met the man of my dreams three years ago on this app since then we got married have a dog and cat and have grown with each other thank you badoo for allowing me to find my person
title: Finding my person

review: Don’t download the update!!!! Don’t download the update!!!! Don’t download the update!!!! I came here to read reviews before I updated the app because i wanted to see if anyone said anything about ads popping up because I didn’t want that. I didn’t see any reviews like that so I updated and now my Badoo has ads in it pop up for 30 whole seconds!!! And you can’t do anything while it’s running! I barely use this app to begin with but now this really is going to make me use it less if even at all. If you have this app and have not added the newest update which came out DO NOT UPDATE!!! developerResponse: {'id': 32595527, 'body': 'Badoo will always champion diversity which means that we have a wide range of members using our platform. We suggest changing your preferences according to what you are searching for.', 'modified': '2022-10-16T07:56:13Z'}
review: I really like this UI and concept better than their other app Bumble. However, it would only be good if you are into Latinas, black/white, Filipinos and Hispanic people because there are barely any East Asians on this app and I’m confused on why that is but it is what it is. Nice concept and good potential but I don’t think they have enough Chinese/Korean/Japanese users. Sadly for me that’s kind of the group of people I was hoping to go for. Still a good app though compared to other dating apps.
title: Nice Concept

developerResponse: {'id': 8871309, 'body': 'We’re sorry to hear of your experience. We do not tolerate rude or inappropriate behaviour on Badoo. If you ever feel uncomfortable, or experience any negative comments or behaviour, please do report this to us and our 24/7 moderation team will investigate immediately. We investigate all reports and always take appropriate action!', 'modified': '2019-05-27T07:48:30Z'}
review: I’ve been harassed so badly on this app by whiny boys who can’t handle the most polite and/or passive rejection, it’s unbelievable. Every single time I’ve been unnecessarily cussed out (it’s a regular occurrence, all I have to do is not respond or politely decline and that will set off some guy whose feelings are hurt) I report their disgusting, foul language to Badoo and NOTHING HAPPENS. They take zero steps whatsoever to protect women from hateful speech. I’ve even reported a guy who DIRECTLY THREATENED me via the site and no one at Badoo cared one single bit, nor did they do ANYTHING. No one wants to be called “the c word” every day and find out those trolls are still free to harass women as they please because the people monitoring the app don’t care about women or their safety.
title: DANGEROUS FOR WOMEN

developerResponse: {'id': 7243138, 'body': 'Thanks for taking the time to send your feedback. Badoo has always been free to use and we want to keep it this way, this means that we have recently introduced advertising. Ads will not be shown to users who have purchased our paid features. If you want to remove the ads, you can either subscribe to Badoo Premium, or buy Credits.', 'modified': '2019-02-11T13:30:15Z'}
review: To write short, it is my honest opinion and I feel this to be true, the app starts video ads at intervals with no reason without user input upon accepting to view the video ad or not, it also does not keep track of how many swipes you get a day, you don’t get 400 a day but a bank, they make the random number up, it may be cumulative but could be 300 one day and only 20 the next!  All of this smells like poor business practices, just they revenue a lot apparently and it gives the developers of this app the right to do this, I think it may violate some user rights, seriously very disappointing! Sorry to see this from creators I can’t believe apple lets them run like this!
title: Disappointing

developerResponse: {'id': 4197845, 'body': "Most users who appear in the Encounters section live close to you. However, once you've voted on the closest users, you will see people in the closest cities and then nationwide. Badoo is determined to stamp out fake profile registrations, which is why we've introduced photo verification; this will help stop fake profiles for good.", 'modified': '2018-07-11T18:19:57Z'}
review: I signed up with Badoo after a 2 year absence and it’s just crap. First of all all the matches are people living over 1000 miles away from me you hardly get to see any locals unless you go to the section which says people nearby. Then on top of that they require a photo verification I delete my picture I don’t want it on there and every time I try to logon they ask me to upload my picture I approach the same picture that I deleted but it takes almost 30 minutes to get online again because of some stupid picture verification. That is the slowest verification of ever seen in my life that something they just added on there and it totally ruins the app for me.
title: Dissatisfied

developerResponse: {'id': 31448054, 'body': "Hey Emmie, we are sorry to hear this. Anybody in your area can see your profile as this is how our encounters section and people nearby section work. If somebody you don't like pops up, please delete them from your inbox. We would never want you to feel unsafe on the app and value our member's privacy. This is why we have added a hidden feature too. We hope you will change your mind and give us another shot💜", 'modified': '2022-08-14T10:34:05Z'}
review: This app makes me feel very unsafe. I could not find an age meter, and men 25-27 could constantly see my profile and would request to chat with me. I am 19. The feature that helps you find people nearby is especially frightening. Someone could easily find me at work. The app also once sent a message from me to a stranger without me knowing. I did not match with them or type the message, but it made it look like I had. As a young woman who lives alone I am very scared of strangers knowing my location. Rather than alter my settings to protect my privacy I deleted my account along with all my data.
title: This app makes me feel very unsafe.

developerResponse: {'id': 28523399, 'body': "I'm really sorry about your experience, but we only block members who don't comply with our community guidelines. Please take a look at them here: Badoo.com/guidelines, and if you think there could have been a mistake in your block, contact us at badoo.com/feedback💜", 'modified': '2022-03-11T19:46:04Z'}
review:
Almost zero English speakers and, I got blocked for being not nice? I have never ever ever said anything remotely bad but I wasn’t nice to someone? Goh Don’t install.

*EDIT: No I don’t want to reach out because it WAS a mistake by your side and I am exhausted of companies pushing products out to market not fully tested.  There is no reason why I should have been blocked and if you use a software that somehow interpreted my messages as ‘not nice’ then your software is garbage.
All too often today we are used to buy products that don’t work and then have to hound the companies for a fix and resolution. No. Not doing it anymore.
title: Probably the worst dating app for Americans

developerResponse: {'id': 26540616, 'body': 'Hey there, We are sorry to hear you say this. We value our non-discriminatory app and we think this filter would create space to be more discriminatory and that is the last thing we want. Rather than basing off on our ethnicity, we believe you can find the person you love through filtering interests. Hope this helps 💜', 'modified': '2021-11-29T16:40:09Z'}
review: If you are looking for mostly non-white and/or East European, working class men this is the app for you! You can verify yourself & see only verified accts if you choose and filter for everything EXCEPT ethnicity. That is a big exception & reason why I deleted my acct after being on it a few hrs. I know what I prefer. Badoo not allowing users to filter based on ethnicity is a big obstacle. I’ve tried every “4+ star rated” & “Apple Editor picks” dating app. The ratings are sus. Tbh I think they are not particularly helpful to anyone seeking a legit dating experience.
title: Mostly nonwh ite & euro men

review:
❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰Excellent app, the best of all. 
Keep up the great work guys, we love you, thank you for this amazing app!!!   Great app, great service! I love all the features that allows you to get closer with your matches, like the videochat, or the bumps, always a great selection of people, and the best you can if you want only talk to people that is verified, i love this feature,
Excellent, getting better all the time, the best for their customers, easy to use, very helpful, love it, love it, love it!!!
title: Excellent app!❤️🥰👏

review: Around 3 years ago, I downloaded this app to look for someone to just talk to, I wasn’t really looking for a relationship since I had recently got out of a long one but I was down to just go with the flow, long story short.. I met my fiancé on this app, we realized that we were going to the same school, we met up, hooked up, and then started dating lol. We really clicked since the beginning.. and now were engaged. Crazy, right? Haha.
title: Looking for love ?

developerResponse: {'id': 13052951, 'body': "Hi there, if your profile has been blocked, it's because you've breached our Community Guidelines. If you believe that you've been blocked in error, please contact us on badoo.com/feedback.\n\nHowever, please understand that if your profile is found to have been blocked correctly, our decision is final and your account will remain blocked.", 'modified': '2020-01-22T06:23:56Z'}
review: Apparently I was reported for impersonating Beyoncé. First of all none of my pictures belong to anyone else but me. All of my photos are of me and only include me alone. Second off I’m a male and clearly a male as I have a beard in most of my photos. I don’t understand why my photos were removed and why I received a “Yellow Flag” and was warned. I can see that this company cannot correctly verify reports with accuracy. Their employees are either lazy or their technology is flawed substantially and I can only imagine how many accounts have suffered due to mistakes that have not been corrected. This company is ridiculous and advise many who use this app to uninstall and find another app.
title: Inability to review reports accurately

review: So I been on badoo for about a couple of weeks now and everything has been good, until they randomly permanently blocked my profile because there was “reports” that I was breaking the rules. I contacted them on details of what “violations” I made against their policies and I didn’t even get a response other than them saying I was permanently deleted. It’s unprofessional, rude, and uncalled for. This is an adult app so it shouldn’t be so strict. I never showed myself nude or said anything inappropriate to anyone disrespectfully unless they disrespect me first. I’m pretty bummed out because I was earning a lot of coins and views for my live streams. This app is very shady.
title: BLOCKED MY PROFILE

developerResponse: {'id': 17791504, 'body': 'Hey there! Many thanks for your detailed and honest review 💜 If you feel like taking your experience to new heights 🚀, please do drop us a message @BadooHelp on social media anytime!', 'modified': '2021-06-03T15:54:30Z'}
review: I appreciate that you can easily interact with others and get real time responses. I dislike that ppl that you are not interested in can just message you without a real option to delete the messages you don’t want to read. The ppl on this app seem quicker to respond versus experience with other apps and their is a variety of men and women to choose from and not all the same types of ppl. I’m enjoying it so far. Day 2 user.
title: Responsive dating app

developerResponse: {'id': 34182148, 'body': 'Hey there, we are sorry that you feel this way. We assure you that we do not have any bots on our site. We also have a 0 tolerance policy towards any fake profiles as well as scammers. Our moderators work 24/7 to remove any fake profiles from our app💫 Please report anyone suspicious that you see and we can look into this for you! Hope to hear from you soon.', 'modified': '2023-01-09T16:22:42Z'}
review: A lot of the people I encountered on this app were fake & scammers. Too many people on here were looking for sex (they literally mention it in their bio) but for some reason that gets flagged. Aside from the boys, be careful when putting your card info into this app. I was charged twice for a service that I requested once. Apparently I subscribed to a $1.99 service that renews EVERY DAY… so every single day I was being charged $1.99. What kind of business does that? When I made the ONE TIME PURCHASE it was meant to be for one time only. This app continues to disappoint and I would not recommend to anyone including strangers.
title: Full of bots and questionable practices

developerResponse: {'id': 33644998, 'body': 'Hi Johnny, we want everybody to have a good experience with us. We have recorded your feedback and will be relaying it back to the relevant teams. Remember it is free to speak to your matches as well as use the people nearby feature, so get matching! If you would like any help please contact us on @BadooHelp or badoo.com/feedback/🥰', 'modified': '2022-12-10T12:25:17Z'}
review: I decided to take one for the team and to try out Badoo so I can give an idea of it to others. I noticed right away that it requires alot of paywalls to chat to people. Big red flag. But whatever for the most part seemed kind of legit. Which I’m sure it is as I got to text a couple people. But almost 99% of the people don’t talk nor look at your messages. Which can be normal. But it reflects the community. (Atleast in my opinion) I’d say try it out as free and see where it goes but DON’T bother spending any money on it. You have better luck meeting others in alternative apps.
title: Legit but not legit

developerResponse: {'id': 30657733, 'body': "We're sorry to hear about your negative experience, but Badoo is free to use. We offer paid options for additional services, such as seeing who has liked you, but you can use the people nearby section and chat for free with anyone you match.", 'modified': '2022-07-01T06:54:45Z'}
review: I haven’t been on this app before, but ever since my friend told me about the app I decided to give it a try, the app is good and the people there in, but a lot of subscriptions are to be made, you can’t possibly see who likes you and like back, unless you upgrade to premium which I think most people don’t have such amount to pay 😞also can’t send messages to premium subscribers. I’m verified on the app but I don’t have a lot of money for such subscription, please do something about it. Thanks 😊
title: Better

review:
Reviewing from NYC, straight, male identifying. Plenty of people to swipe on.. but sadly the ratio is like
30% women living in DR
30% women living in Philippines/Korea
15% trans ‘women’.. 
all of which cannot be filtered out with a preference.

Swiping for a week, got a few matches that never reply. I think with the free version the app also plays games as I would get exactly 1 like or match each day, so that my ‘activity’ meter stayed low (incentivizing a buy of the premium feature).

There should be some icon for people changing their location from their actual one so it can be filtered out. There should also be a way to filter gender, because now it is only ‘boys/girl/both’ yet transgender is considered as one of those. When it should be it’s own category to filter out

I did enjoy the amount of minority representation in the app.. I was interested in something like 1/25 profiles I saw.
title: Mostly foreigners, trans, and non responders

title: More lies!!

I love the app. However, please add a blocking feature ASAP. So many creeps just can’t take no for an answer. You can report, delete or skip them but it doesn’t help. Blocking feature should be a no brainer in a app like this. Keep up the good work, just add BLOCK. Please and thank you 😊

Please don't hesitate to reach out if you'd like to discuss any concerns further - we're also available on social media @BadooHelp", 'modified': '2021-07-07T20:36:29Z'}
review:
It’s taking me days to delete my account on this thing. You can’t even do it on your own. I had to contact their support team, and they sent me an email asking me for my government id in order to “confirm” I’m the owner of the account. Currently checking to see if that’s even something they are allowed to do, in order to report them.

Stay away. Don’t give these people your personal and sensitive information. Gathering government id data in order to delete an account I’m another level of disgusting. Lots of other apps to download, or dare I say, meet people the old school way 🙄
title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD: The worst User Experience

developerResponse: {'id': 16124060, 'body': 'Sorry to hear this! Credits and Badoo Premium are two separate premium services. Badoo Premium is a subscription based service that enables you access functionalities for the period you subscribe. Credits are used to purchase self-promotion services in Encounters and Spotlight. Remember you can message your matches for free!', 'modified': '2020-06-21T15:48:51Z'}
review:
They sell lifetime subscription which is actually doesn't give you any improvements, and after trying to charge you for every message you sent. So, let me explain how it works:
People, who don't have it will not see likes from you and to get their attention you need to send them a text. The algorithm doesnt optimized on a match basis like in Tinder. You have the option to send a text, but only others premium subscribers can see it. That's not clear. And if you want to text someone you nee to pay extra for every message.

I requested a refund roughly earlier then 7 days of my purchase and my request was denied. So how is that? I paid for a lifetime service. Not for a one-time service. So I own this service, I didn't waste it. I want my money back!

I would understand this if I just paid for a simple text or gift of the other feature that has nothing to do with time length. But it's not the case. 

Use Tinder, guys. At least they will do a refund in case your not satisfied.
title: Money scam!

developerResponse: {'id': 4843156, 'body': 'Sorry to hear this. To assist you with any billing issues on your account, we kindly request that you contact us on badoo.com/feedback.\n\n This will allow us to bring up your details and get back to you as quickly as possible.', 'modified': '2018-08-28T13:24:29Z'}
review: I used to be able to use credits to highlight my profile.  As of last month, the app takes my credits but does not highlight my profile.  In addition, I use to see both genders highlighted but only see females now, which indicates that something has changed with the app, and that change has created a bug with highlighting profiles.  With so many other apps available, I don’t plan on using this app again until they fix the highlight bug.  I find the app to be about 10% of what it used to be when I could highlight my profile.  I’ve had several email exchanges with BADOO about this and they have yet to fix the issue.
title: App is useless now

review:
Okay, it’s pretty good but here is something I am sure EVERYONE would agree with, update the filter settings, I am sorry, but I am fit and athletic and only into other fit and athletic guys. I want to be able to select filters like height and weight for my other possible matches. 
And it would also REALLY help if the app actually went with Distance. I don’t want to be matched with a guy who lives in Oregon when I’m in Massachusetts. Long distance relationships NEVER work... EVER... Please fix this app, and I will GLADLY become a premium user...
title: Okay it’s pretty good but Premium could be better

Overall not a bad app  ✨ but some of the guys on here are scary

title: Badoo

developerResponse: {'id': 7924950, 'body': "Badoo is free to use but, for those of you who want to stand out from the crowd, we also offer a large range of premium services such as Credits and Badoo Premium. Alternatively, keep an eye out for our offer-wall promotions that'll reward you for taking part in surveys and app downloads!", 'modified': '2019-03-27T06:07:40Z'}
review:
UPDATE: Dev response is generic and similar to most of the other reviews. Ignored most of the points made and made sure to mention premium. No thanks Badoo devs. 
----
This app feels more like a camshow app disguised as a dating app. The constant bombardment for premium features along with the lack of filtering shows the true intentions of the app pretty quickly . 

Yes, you can see other users and begin a chat. It's really bad when you match with someone outside of your county, and hours away. No filtering by distance ruins a lot. 

There are live shows which involve people asking for donations to 'sing' or 'cross their eyes'. Spend money to talk to someone who is premium. Spend money to be more popular. 

Your popularity chart is meant to make you feel undesired. Day 1 vs Day 2 are vastly different . Day 1 is to show you there are actual people. Day 2 is to show you that you need to spend money for improved chances of matching . 

Save yourself the time and stay away from the most cash grab app I've come across.
title: Avoid this app

review: So far this app has women who are looking for the man of there dreams on here! Nothing is approachable to some of them are fake profiles! Having to keep up with what’s real is a challenge and you don’t have unlimited chats. It shouldn’t be a money thing if your trying to help people meet and get to know each other. That’s just me. If the tranny’s can be filtered better it would help cause 99% of men don’t want that when searching for REAL women.
title: Ummmm....Real?

developerResponse: {'id': 10316842, 'body': 'Your opinion really matters to us! So thank you for taking the time to leave this constructive review. We will forward your comments to the relevant team for further review, so it can be taken into consideration in future updates. Thank you for helping us build a better product!', 'modified': '2019-08-23T09:41:35Z'}
review: I just learned that Badoo, marketed as an all-around dating app, is the same as Blendr, marketed as straight-people Grindr. The app itself is also clunky: it’s too easy to accidentally swipe right with no clear way to unswipe. The bio gives you lots of space to write and then cuts off the text arbitrarily—not that many people write anything about themselves. I got premium but can only select age and distance, no other customization. If there’s any clear direction on how to use the app features, it’s not obvious after months of using it. Just clicking around to try buttons does things like send automatically written messages you didn’t intend. I’m leaving.
title: Badoo = Blendr

Thank god, but Badoo does have 1 problem. You get a ton of people from Dominican Republic, or Venezuela. Badoo needs to make changing locations a PAID. Thing so not everyone can do that.

Hopefully I will get to go out on dates if I can match more people in my area. Please fix this.

review: I like how it gets people to verify their photos and it’s cool that you don’t necessarily have to be a match to get a chance to chat. It would be nice if you could see a list of people that you’ve already liked, and there should be a way to see which profiles you’ve already visited. And I understand the need to make money, but it doesn’t make sense to not be able to see people that like or favorite you.
title: Good concept, needs a few improvements though.

review: I love this app. You know how other apps promise to be inclusive when really they are describing you as an everything and anything. I felt the love from the guys who were interested in me and read my bio and understood I’m still beautiful by being trans. Tinder, keeps you in a little corner, POF is literally a broke version of Badoo, and Badoo is the definition of a good dating. Great options of men, so I know their are some good looking women. Glad that this app exists.
title: I felt seen.

review: There are a lot of half assed dating apps that just want money and are filled with bots. This is an actual experience that connects to real people in a “closer” radiance than most apps. I’ve actually had conversations and not just some fake stuff. Notifications work most of the time. And you could pay for more features but aren’t necessary to the expensive. Keep up the good work!

I’m not shaving for some verification for a dating app.) And kept telling me my verification picture didn’t match my currently uploaded pictures, which were taking 3 days before. title: Garbage

Therefore, search results could potentially return users of all sexualities.", 'modified': '2019-12-30T15:05:07Z'}
review: Shows you in the opposite sex of what you are looking for.  So if your profile is set up as female, identity as a lesbian on your profile, and you list female as the gender you are searching for you still show up under searches by men and men are able to email and like you. Makes no sense to be in a search for a gender you are not interested in it’s a waste of time for both parties. Unless you are searching for that gender You should not be in that search option.  The only purpose this serves is to simulate that your site has more options for a person to choose from which isn’t the case.
title: Showing up in gender not interested in

developerResponse: {'id': 6572989, 'body': 'Your opinion really matters to us! So thank you for taking the time to leave this constructive review. We will forward your comments to the relevant team for further review, so it can be taken into consideration in future updates. Thank you for helping us build a better product!', 'modified': '2018-12-27T10:53:39Z'}
review: The app does what it’s supposed to. The users are not nearly as attractive as on other dating apps. Not blaming anyone. Just an observation. There is also a relatively high number of transgendered users. No problem with that, but it is time-consuming. More filtering options would be great. Option to restrict location distance would also be helpful. Biggest complaint is there are ambiguous add-ons littering in your inbox - accidentally clicking on them costs credits. No confirmation button, no undo. Pretty wasteful.
title: Works well but needs work

If they aren’t a fake profile (400,000,000 live people?), apparently they can like you back and then chat.

Their are plenty of ways for you to “pay” to get attention or elevate your profile, and that’s on top of your subscription.  Another shameful example of sexploitation.

developerResponse: {'id': 31031271, 'body': "Mixalis, as Badoo is a free website to join, in some cases there are individuals who create profiles on our site with false intentions. Our systems are able to very quickly identify suspicious behaviour and we have a team of moderators that work 24/7 to keep any fake profiles off Badoo. We also count on the support of the community - if something doesn't feel right, please report it and our team will review!", 'modified': '2022-07-22T06:40:30Z'}
review: 80% of the profiles on this app are people with fake pictures and fake locations. Their locations are set to your area but then as soon as you match, they tell you that they really live in Haiti, South America, Thailand, etc.  Also, the “photo verified” badge means nothing because half of the profiles with clearly fake pictures have the badge. Earlier I saw at least 4 profiles using the same pictures with 4 different names, locations, bios, and all were “photo verified”.  Not sure what this app is attempting to do but it’s failed on all fronts.
title: Fake locations and fake profiles galore.

developerResponse: {'id': 29275651, 'body': 'Bernard, this doesn’t sound good! Please send us a message on badoo.com/feedback, and we’ll sort this out for you. Remember to contact us using your registered email address to speed things up!', 'modified': '2022-04-20T06:53:07Z'}
review: I never write reviews, but was appalled by the photo that Badoo took off of my profile. There are countless numbers of men showcasing shirtless photos, and I posted a tasteful, professional shot FULLY CLOTHED with a button down shirt undone, and it was taken off due to it's "inappropriate" nature. This photo has been posted on Instagram and Facebook, and has not been reported as inappropriate anywhere else. To look through every single male profile with shirtless pictures, but to have my fully clothed picture removed, is outrageous. I will not recommend or ever use this app again.
title: Sexist

If you really want to delete your Badoo profile, just log into your account and click on the cog icon  on the top right corner of your profile page. Let us know @BadooHelp on social media or on badoo.com/feedback if you have more questions.", 'modified': '2022-03-02T08:27:11Z'}
review:
I wish I would have read the reviews first. You have 2 options to subscribe. Bad and worse. The more expensive option allows you to unlock 2 contacts for FREE. Other wise you purchase coins. Yes. This app is a money grab. Now for the rest. No one in my immediate area! Of course you can search great distance. I am not sure I want to drive hours to go on a dinner date.
You can not delete your profile if you leave!  This means you are most likely looking at people that left the App already. In short it is BAD OO!
title: If you research this app, you will pass!

developerResponse: {'id': 27790488, 'body': 'Hey Aina, we block anyone that violates our guidelines If you would like us to look into this for you please reach out to us on @BadooHelp or https://badoo.com/feedback/ and we can see what has happened.', 'modified': '2022-02-01T16:41:49Z'}
review: Had about badoo from a friend who met his current wife from here, and I tried signing up also, my first account got locked without a genuine reason for that, after fully verifying myself and identity, I feel tried contacting the support team but nothing was actually done. Had to sign up again I hope this time I meet the love of me life not being kicked out again. But the dating app since like a nice place to be, just feel bad when I got locked out..

review: I like that I have the option to choose what level of education my matches have, I also love that I get to choose what their drinking habits and smoking habits are as well. And you wanna know the best part about all of this is? It's in the free version. Not one single other app lets you do that. That's why I'll probably get badoo premium here in the near future.
title: Badoo

developerResponse: {'id': 19491111, 'body': 'Thank you for this lovely review. We hope you find everything that you are looking for with us. If you need anything at all you can always reach us on @BadooHelp', 'modified': '2020-12-02T12:33:47Z'}
review: I have only had this app for about a month now and it’s been pretty good so far. I have been able to chat and meet people from all over the place. People seem nice no ones really been to big of flakes lol. It is definitely one of the better apps as people on here seem genuinely interested in actually trying to find some kind of relationship.
title: Good dating app

review: This is one of the best apps I’ve used to find men for dating. I can search by sexual orientation and language. So I can find men who both speak a language I speak and men whose sexual orientation is more compatible with my gender situation. I love the way it’s set up and there are plenty of people using it, so I can find men who live close. I even saw a few familiar faces there. It’s great.
title: Badoo is awesome!

review: I can only give this 5 stars because of all the apps I’ve tried, I actually connected with someone. The platform is similar to Tinder, so using it was familiar.  Give it a try, and hopefully, you’ll have the same success as I.  Oh yeah, I didn’t pay for the premium service.  I was connected with someone who wanted what I wanted using the free version.  Go figure!!
title: It actually worked

review: I wouldn’t only be giving the credit to Badoo, I would also take the time to let them know that, they should try as much as possible to help the users find and get what actually brought them to the app. It’s important for the app to know their purpose. With that being said! I would go ahead and give the credit of the app being in good shape. I enjoy the app
title: Great app

review: This has always been my number one dating app and eventually I met a guy who is now my fiancé. we are just one for the other. I am so grateful we both had the coincidence to meet through here. He didn’t used to go out so we probably wouldn’t have met in person. Badoo is such a great app and easy to use. Hope everyone finds someone worth it here!
title: Met my fiancé through this app

developerResponse: {'id': 33446671, 'body': 'Parker, we are sorry to hear about your negative experience! Please, contact us at @BadooHelp on social media or via badoo.com/feedback. We will look into this and help you!', 'modified': '2022-11-30T07:55:47Z'}
review:
I made an account, and paid for 100 tokens, and the following day, my account is gone. This app took my money. 

 EDIT: contacted support. It’s been 3 weeks. I don’t think there was any attempt to fix this issue. I had my account for one day and didn’t even match with anyone. Again, this app took my money.

EDIT 2: again, I already tried contacting support. Is there anything that I can do  differently contacting support a second time that will help my message reach the feedback team more effectively?
title: I paid for tokens and my account immediately deleted

To see more daters in your region, please try changing your search criteria slightly and you'll see you'll be getting matches in no time! 💜 If you have any questions, please use this contact form:  badoo.com/feedback or @BadooHelp on social media 🙇\u200d♂️", 'modified': '2022-09-11T19:57:14Z'}
review: There aren’t a lot of users on this app. Everyone is over 500 miles away. Even when I changed the filter, people from all the world keep messaging me and viewing my profile. You have to email them and they ask so many questions. They even try to make you send your driver’s license to delete your account. Which is very invasive and unnecessary
title: I don’t like this

review: So this app is a lot at first but you get used it. I like the variety nd the way you can see everything until the free trial runs out and you have to pay to see who likes you and who favorites you. But the people I’ve talked to are actually genuine regardless of what they’re looking for nd have actually met some cool friends. Definitely worth a try if your skeptical.
title: Awesome App

review: I give it 4 stars because of my personal experience. It’s not good or bad to me. The difference between this app compared to others is seemingly the fact that you need time and patience. Between having to be active with app and hopeful that someone feels the same way you feel in terms of first, what you look and second, what you present in terms of personality.

Pls I plead that some fine girl that are wifey in look should be free for some of us that wants to marry to meet up with. I will really appreciate. Thanks.
title: Appeal

Same as other dating apps I’ve been using Badoo for quite some time and I’m getting really frustrated and annoyed with the matches in connecting with. I’m tired of these dating apps that make theirselves out to seem like they’re good when they’re not. Every one of them is too pay to use. You need to pay if you want success. Honestly, you’d be better off not using dating apps and going out to meet people.

developerResponse: {'id': 34271252, 'body': "Hi there! review: I’ve tried multiple apps and badoo is a favorite partly because it’s pretty easy to use and there are a good amount of people I have talked with more than tinder I really liked that they offered a three day trial of the premium features the only reason I gave it 4 stars is because I wish that the premium features were free.
title: Pretty good just wish the premium features are free

We hope that helps!", 'modified': '2022-07-26T06:59:44Z'}
review: Ok, nothing agains my Latino friends, but I’m in South Florida and 80% of users on Badoo are Spanish descent, I’d say another 10% are black, and 10% are white boys like me.  How is that possible?  I don’t know, but I requested refund from iTunes within 3 business days and they reversed the charge ($80 for 6 mos.).  Thank you iTunes!  I like a little spicy Latin flavor, but into white guys more. Another weird observation, most profiles are written in Spanish, then also have an English translation.  The Latinos have taken over this app.  I’d be curious to see what the developer says about it.
title: 80% Spanish profiles

developerResponse: {'id': 27327420, 'body': 'Thank you for your feedback! 💜', 'modified': '2022-01-09T17:13:10Z'}
review:
The format is okay, though it lets men far away like my profile even though my distance is set to 25 miles. Reporting fakes is easy, but I don't know if they do anything about it.

I wish they'd eliminate the "checked your profile" and "favorited" page from the unpaid. It's just irritating to skip them all. 

Lots of fake profiles, but lots of real ones too
title: Not bad for meeting people

review: Love the multiple ways to communicate, love the verified user process to avoid catfish scenarios.  LOVE!! the blocked unsolicited inappropriate photos.  I appreciate the thought put into making things fun and safe.  I still have to apply common sense when interacting with members but it’s fun! Try it and you’ll leave all those other apps behind.
title: Getting the most out of online dating

review: Everything is great, it’s easy to use it, and i feel like it’s really safe. The only “bad” thing is that is shows you people that sometimes are a bit too far from you. Like hours away, and I couldn’t find a setting that allows you to meet people within a ratio of 3 kilometer for example.
title: I’ve met so many people through this app!

developerResponse: {'id': 20528459, 'body': "Hey there, we're sorry to hear you haven't found many users nearby- we recommend widening your search preferences to see more users- you can do this in both Encounters and People Nearby within the app. If you need help, drop us a message at @badoohelp on social.", 'modified': '2021-01-20T12:14:16Z'}
review: Firstly, this app doesn't have enough users despite my living in a metropolitan city. I keep getting an automatic message saying there's not enough users. Secondly, maybe to compensate for its low number of users, it doesn't offer enough filters to accommodate whom you're looking for. Unlike other dating apps, it doesn't let me filter based on whether my potential date has kids, race, etc. Thirdly, it has some very deceptive in-app buttons that charge your credit card with just 1 click, then rejects your request for a refund based on the obscure contract term. Despicable and useless app.
title: Meritless Dating App

review: I like this app. One thing that I find irritating is that photos in my profile change their order on their own and I cannot change it back. It is very annoying when you picked a nice portrait photo for main picture but then all of a sudden it changes to landscape photo and zooms in to my tiny face on it.

review: For some reason there are a lot of Latin American women who live in Latin America however their profile says that they’re from New York City. review: Why is my account being moderated I don’t pick on anybody. I’ve had this account for 5 years. And now I’m in warning of it being deleted. That seems unfair. Please reconsider this moderation as I’ve have been a steady user for 5 years with this account. Read the conversation from which it was reported from as well I’ve done nothing wrong!
title: They need to moderate their site better

developerResponse: {'id': 1321537, 'body': 'We’ll get this looked at for you. Please drop us a message on http://m.badoo.com/settings-feedback. Remember to contact us using your registered email address to speed things up.', 'modified': '2017-09-21T15:37:00Z'}
review:
Crappy, inexcusable user experience: I shut down my account, but neglected to require Badoo to stop sending me emails before doing so. Well, guess what: I can’t stop the emails now because there’s no unsubscribe button on their emails - you’re stuck in limbo. 

Developers: I don’t want to restart my account to opt out of your emails. Please fix the UX.

Two stars for a decent UI - meaning Badoo peppering me with all their "buy this now!" Super Powers doesn't feel TOO invasive. 

There were only two women I found attractive in the Seattle area, and both turned out to be scams, asking me to visit them on another web site. I reported them both and asked for refunds for gifts I sent them both - no reply from Badoo, so I guess I'm out cash in exchange for offering too much trust.

I'd like a complete refund actually, but that's probably asking too much.
title: Seattle is Disappointing

developerResponse: {'id': 35022324, 'body': 'This doesn’t sound good! Please send us a message @BadooHelp or reach out via badoo.com/feedback, and we’ll sort this out for you. Remember to contact us using your registered email address to speed things up! 💜', 'modified': '2023-02-22T20:53:20Z'}
review: Became a streamer on badoo it was a lot of fun meeting new people. Got really invested and started taking it a bit more serious and decided to start spending money. Please Fix The Live feature! at this point it’s all i even use the app for.

And then I still got blocked for the same reason and again after I tried making a 3rd one. Badoo, i have no commercial intentions just so you know. But I guess you hate me that much so ok, bye , i get it.
